name: Tomato Basil Pasta
instructions:
1. Boil pasta per packet instructions.
2. Sauté garlic in olive oil…
3. Add chopped tomatoes and basil…
4. Toss with pasta and serve.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions:
1. Marinate chicken in soy sauce…
2. Stir-fry garlic, veggies, then chicken…
3. Serve with rice.

name: Carrot Ginger Soup
instructions: 1. Sauté chopped onion and garlic in a little oil until soft. 2. Add sliced carrots and grated ginger, cook 5 min. 3. Pour in broth, simmer 20 min. 4. Blend until smooth, season to taste.

name: Onion Chicken Skillet
instructions: 1. Season chicken, sear in skillet until golden. 2. Remove chicken; sauté sliced onion, garlic, and thyme. 3. Return chicken, add a splash of water, cover and cook 15 min. Serve.

name: Mushroom Omelette
instructions: 1. Sauté sliced mushrooms in butter until golden. 2. Whisk eggs with salt, pour over mushrooms. 3. Sprinkle cheese, cook until set, fold and serve.

name: Egg Salad
instructions: 1. Hard-boil eggs, peel and chop. 2. Mix with mayo, mustard, diced celery, and salt. 3. Chill briefly and serve on bread or lettuce.

name: Broccoli Cheddar Soup
instructions: 1. Melt butter, whisk in flour to make roux. 2. Gradually stir in milk. 3. Add chopped broccoli, simmer until tender. 4. Stir in cheese until melted, season to taste.

name: Garlic Butter Shrimp
instructions: 1. Melt butter, add minced garlic and cook 1 min. 2. Add shrimp, sauté until pink (3–4 min). 3. Squeeze lemon juice, toss with chopped parsley and serve.

name: Pepper Beef Stir Fry
instructions: 1. Marinate beef strips in soy sauce and garlic for 10 min. 2. Stir-fry sliced onion and peppers until crisp-tender. 3. Add beef, cook until done and sauce is slightly reduced.

name: Tomato Pepper Salad
instructions: 1. Dice tomato, pepper, and onion. 2. Toss with olive oil and chopped basil. 3. Season with salt and serve chilled.
